Great news, your GoMo order is on it's way! All the details you need are right here. And no need to worry - once your o= rder is out for delivery, we'll send you an email and a text so you know ex= actly when it will arrive. You'll need to be available to sign for your order when it arrives. No worr= ies if you're not there, we'll leave a card with all the details you need t= o rearrange your delivery. Just a reminder our SIM(s) will be delivered to 123 Google Crescent, Google= Drive, Citywest. Here's all the good stuff you need to know about your order: Order Number: BXXNC9XK Offers: Offer Name: Go More, Once Off Charge: =E2=82=AC9.99, Monthly Charge: =E2=82=AC9.99 Totals: Once Off Total: =E2=82=AC9.99 Recurring Total: =E2=82=AC9.99 We'll send you another email shortly with your account details, steps to ve= rify your email address and how to manage your account online with MyGoMo. Hey B!

 

Great news, your GoMo order is on it's = way!

 

All the details you need are right her= e. And no need to worry - once your order is out for delivery, we'll send you = an email and a text so you know exactly when it will arrive.

 

You'll need to be available to sign for your order when it = arrives. No worries if you're not there, we'll leave a card with all the de= tails you need to rearrange your delivery.


Just a reminder your SIM(s) will be delivered to 123 = Google Crescent, Google Drive, Citywest.

Here's all the good stuff you need to know about your= order:


Order number: BXXNC9XK

We'll send you another email shortly with= your account details, steps to verify your email address and how to manage= your account online with MyGoMo.


If you ever need us, chat to us here= .


Welcome to GoMo!

Terms and con= ditions apply. You may cancel your order within 14 days from the day we pro= vide the services to you. For more information and full terms and condition= s click here.
